attributes.action: Stop the killing of all our wildlife in UK and ireland
attributes.additional_details: I'm a naturelest and there people killing our wildlife it's not acceptable and if nothing is done there will be no change some of our animals will be extinct if we don't do something about this
attributes.background: I want the government to stop the killing of foxes elephants tigers sharks and many more wee need change and we need this change now

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already illegal to kill most of the animals mentioned in the petition. It is legal to shoot foxes under specific circumstances:

https://www.gov.uk/hunting/mammals
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
